alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 11:12AM EST until February 21 at 8:01AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Butler, Ohio and Muhlenberg Counties. .Heavy rain that fell Thursday will cause the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO MONDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 17.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 18.1 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.2 feet on 07/09/2013. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
